name: Fast Finder Bot (God Mode)
description: Ultra Advanced Auto Filter Bot with Dual Database, Clone System, Premium Payments & Web Streaming.

ADMINS.description: User IDs of Admins (Separated by space). Example: 123456 789012

BACKUP_DATABASE_URI.description: Secondary MongoDB Connection String (For Dual Save Mode). Leave empty if not needed.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for Bot Logs (Make bot admin). Starts with -100

BIN_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for Storing Files (File Store). Starts with -100

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for Force Subscribe. Starts with -100. (Optional)

URL.description: Your App URL (e.g., https://your-app-name.herokuapp.com/). Don't forget the trailing slash /

UPI_ID.description: Your UPI ID for Payments (e.g., username@okhdfcbank).

UPI_NAME.description: Name to show on Payment Receipt.

RECEIPT_SEND_USERNAME.description: Username where users will send payment screenshots (e.g., @AdminUser).

DUAL_SAVE_MODE.description: Save files to both Primary and Backup DB?

DISABLE_CLONE.description: Disable users from creating Clone Bots?
